1st Year Course Selection Course selection is straightforward. It seemed like a rather daunting task before the semester began, but if you thoroughly read through the website of the David Cheriton School of Computer Science, you'll know what to do. Again, be sure to check your email regularly. In CS, you're pre-enrolled in 3 of your 5 courses. These include MATH 135, MATH 137 and CS135. Here's a brief description of these 3 courses:
